turn.4: Brian Michaels grew up in Kingsbury, London.
turn.5: What is something interesting about Brian Michaels' early life?

turn.10: In Germany his theatre career began in 1978 with the creation of "Il Teatro Siciliano" in Frankfort – the first immigrant theatre in Germany.
turn.11: Did Brian Michaels do anything else in Germany?
turn.12: His work with the group " I MACAP".., which he co-founded in 1981, was based on a re-invigoration of the traditions of the Commedia dell’arte.
